categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Lieutenant Klito was an Imperial officer who served in the Imperial Navy as a Hangar Deck Officer aboard the Victory-class Star Destroyer Subjugator. During the Galactic Civil War, the Subjugator fell under attack from a Alliance to Restore the Republic task force and Captain Kolaff, the vessel's commander, ordered Klito to prepare the command shuttle for departure, in order to allow the Imperial engineer Lira Wessex to escape.
